comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: if we see usually people will come when it is crowded aka buy expensive, sometimes without them realizing that this is the right moment to invest in crypto because it provides returns thousands of times the profits for the next few years, people who have learned from yesterday may take advantage of this moment in the bear market to buy more, so don't miss this moment

comments.author: posi
comments.body: There's a saying in the market that no one doesn't know, buy low sell high and a bear market is when things get cheap, a bull market is for profit taking. No one is going to get rich just showing up in a bull market and leaving when a bear market arrives. Bear market is where we accumulate good coins like bitcoin or ethereum at a highly discounted price and we sell them when the bull market comes, this coin can go up 4x, 5x even 10 times. If you are new to the market and we are in a bear market, can say you are lucky to have come at the right time like now when everything is very cheap very good to buy, don't miss the opportunity rare association.

comments.author: Pierre 2
comments.body: Yeah obviously, "buy when there is blood on street" is famous saying with financial markets. When noone is interested everything is cheap so things you buy will become very valuable in future when everyone will join to make money. That will be where you leave out. Actually bull market peak is where you sell. Its main point with crypto. But I think its better to wait some more before buying alternative coins.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Belinda1732 on October 08, 2022, 09:23:10 AMBase on the steady market increase early this year, some coins increases times two but now it has falling drastically. If we are talking about good coins here, then buying at a cheaper price are always the smart move. Remember, there’s a lot of weak people that don’t want to take the risk on buying during bear market and that’s why they missed a lot of opportunities. You have two options though, you can wait for the price to down a little before you buy or you can start buying some now and when the price goes dipper, you can buy more. Take the risk and with good coins, it’s more worth it.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: If you have the funds, why not.The current bear market however is very different as the global economy is not as good as it was back in the previous bear market where things are close to being stable. The geopolitics is disrupting economies that is getting worse by the day and the bear market could get worse due the energy war. You better just hold your cash for now and wait for the positive run.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: With cryptocurrency buying, it is always advised to buy at the lowest price possible. This will increase the chance of making the profit at the earliest. Buying at the top and making profit after that is really hard. It is possible, but the time period to enjoy the profit is large. So, it is good to buy when the market is bearish.
